commands.name: az storage blob lease acquire
commands.syntax:
az storage blob lease acquire --blob-name
                              --container-name
                              [--account-key]
                              [--account-name]
                              [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                              [--blob-endpoint]
                              [--connection-string]
                              [--if-match]
                              [--if-modified-since]
                              [--if-none-match]
                              [--if-unmodified-since]
                              [--lease-duration]
                              [--proposed-lease-id]
                              [--sas-token]
                              [--tags-condition]
                              [--timeout]
examples: az storage blob lease acquire -b myblob -c mycontainer --account-name mystorageaccount --account-key 0000-0000

commands.name: az storage blob lease break
commands.summary: Break the lease, if the container or blob has an active lease.
commands.syntax:
az storage blob lease break --blob-name
                            --container-name
                            [--account-key]
                            [--account-name]
                            [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                            [--blob-endpoint]
                            [--connection-string]
                            [--if-match]
                            [--if-modified-since]
                            [--if-none-match]
                            [--if-unmodified-since]
                            [--lease-break-period]
                            [--sas-token]
                            [--tags-condition]
                            [--timeout]

commands.name: az storage blob lease change
commands.summary: Change the lease ID of an active lease.
commands.syntax:
az storage blob lease change --blob-name
                             --container-name
                             --lease-id
                             --proposed-lease-id
                             [--account-key]
                             [--account-name]
                             [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                             [--blob-endpoint]
                             [--connection-string]
                             [--if-match]
                             [--if-modified-since]
                             [--if-none-match]
                             [--if-unmodified-since]
                             [--sas-token]
                             [--tags-condition]
                             [--timeout]

commands.name: az storage blob lease release
commands.syntax:
az storage blob lease release --blob-name
                              --container-name
                              --lease-id
                              [--account-key]
                              [--account-name]
                              [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                              [--blob-endpoint]
                              [--connection-string]
                              [--if-match]
                              [--if-modified-since]
                              [--if-none-match]
                              [--if-unmodified-since]
                              [--sas-token]
                              [--tags-condition]
                              [--timeout]

commands.name: az storage blob lease renew
commands.syntax:
az storage blob lease renew --blob-name
                            --container-name
                            --lease-id
                            [--account-key]
                            [--account-name]
                            [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                            [--blob-endpoint]
                            [--connection-string]
                            [--if-match]
                            [--if-modified-since]
                            [--if-none-match]
                            [--if-unmodified-since]
                            [--sas-token]
                            [--tags-condition]
                            [--timeout]
examples: az storage blob lease renew -b myblob -c mycontainer --lease-id "32fe23cd-4779-4919-adb3-357e76c9b1bb" --account-name mystorageaccount --account-key 0000-0000
